item.source: Something is not quite working for me

item.title: Something is not quite working for me
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

I am making an NPC talk when you click on it. Although, he will only say the first message that is coded, and when you click “Click here to continue” it goes away and doesn’t say the other messages.

Codes:

} if(NPCID == 1283){ NpcDialogue = 124; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

case 124: talk("Have you heard?! There will be partyhats soon!", 1283); break; case 125: talk("I will be giving them away, but for a price..", 1283); break; case 126: talk("I'll give you more information on that later though...", 1283); break; case 127: talk2("First I must hide from guards.", "It's kind of a drug deal gone bad.", 1283); break;

My issue though, is this code is exactly like my other ones, and they work well.

} if(NPCID == 1552){ NpcDialogue = 111; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

case 111: talk("It's Christmas during Spring! I'm Visiting Veng-Pkers!", 1552); break; case 112: talk("Veng-Pkers has sent me to give a free gift!", 1552); break; case 113: talk("Have some crack and this sled, and MERRY XMAS!", 1552); addItem(6448, 1); addItem(4084, 1); break;

As you can see, my other code for the NPC 1283 is based off of this one, 1552. The 1552 NPC says every message, and the codes are identical, why won’t my NPC 1283 not say all the messages? Help is greatly appreciated.

-Incognito-

Read full topic
item.source: Something is not quite working for me
